enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Delegates forwarded a recommendation for COP-5 to adopt the draft decisions on capacity building in developing countries (FCCC/SB/1999/CRP.9) and on capacity building in EITs (FCCC/SB/1999/CRP.10).

The MARSHALL ISLANDS expressed its opposition to a top-down approach and entered a reservation on the request to the Secretariat to coordinate with bilateral and multilateral institutions in preparing the elements of a draft framework for capacity building activities.
